In this paper, we will report on the measurement of IFRB,
IFTB, IFLSD and IFLST from a weakly bent Si plane-parallel
< 0 and the comparison of these interference

The sample was a plane-parallel single
polishing method at Sharan Inc. The
size was 50 mm long, 15 mm wide and
0.28 mm thick. One end of the sample
was clamped and the other end was free
along the gravity direction as shown in
). The sample was bent due to
gravity and the residual strain. The
measuring optical system is shown in
and had a very narrow band of energy
